group_1.narration: *Flip* *Flip*
[textBlack:May 2]@[textBlack:Kei bears everything.]@[textBlack:She doesn't yield to frivolous fancies.]@[textBlack:She only sees what's directly ahead.]
[textBlack:My friends at school only ever talk about]@[textBlack:who's dating who, who they think is cute.]

[textBlack:I'd rather talk about fragrances with Kei.]@[textBlack:The clear aroma of lily-of-the-valley.]@[textBlack:Or the subtle scent of peonies.]@[textBlack:Either would suit Kei I think, but her]@[textBlack:heart is more like a dark marsh at night.]@[textBlack:All those scents sink into it and vanish.]@[textBlack:I, too, am drawn below that inky surface.]
*Flip* *Flip*

[textBlack:May 20]@[textBlack:I went to go see Kei again, and we]@[textBlack:walked as far as her house together.]@[textBlack:When she saw me, Kei said her usual]@[textBlack:"Ugh, geeze."]@[textBlack:It's one of her habits.]@[textBlack:I know it is, but it still hurts.]
[textBlack:We walked together, chatting idly while we]@[textBlack:admired the white roses on the way home.]

[textBlack:She didn't have homeroom today,]@[textBlack:so she got there earlier than usual.]@[textBlack:I wanted to ask her if she waited for me.]@[textBlack:Maybe I'd have managed it if I were the]@[textBlack:type who could play it off as a joke.]
*Flip* *Flip* *Flip*

[textBlack:June 12]@[textBlack:I think about telling you I hate you each]@[textBlack:time we meet, and each time we part.]@[textBlack:Would you be upset if I did?]@[textBlack:Over time the sadness in your heart]@[textBlack:would heal. You'd become a stranger, Kei.]@[textBlack:Maybe you'd find a happier future.]
[textBlack:But I can't do it. I can't say I hate you.]@[textBlack:I'm so afraid of being alone.]@[textBlack:I'm so afraid of being left behind.]@[textBlack:All I ever think about is myself.]

[textBlack:According to Kei, I'm a good person.]@[textBlack:I can't think of myself that way at all.]@[textBlack:All I need is her.]@[textBlack:But she won't believe me.]@[textBlack:Do I have to put on an act, be a version]@[textBlack:of myself that she'll believe?]
*Flip*

[textBlack:June 26]@[textBlack:Everything will change now.]@[textBlack:I alone will stay while everything changes.]@[textBlack:No matter how strong the fragrance, over]@[textBlack:enough time it grows faint even in memory.]

[textBlack:If this could just be the end...]@[textBlack:If only I could seal us away in a bottle.]@[textBlack:I'd extract us from all the contaminants]@[textBlack:and I'd seal us away.]@[textBlack:The inside would be so dark that we]@[textBlack:couldn't see our hands. It would be]@[textBlack:a place that was no place at all.]
[textBlack:No one else will be able to see or know]@[textBlack:us there. In the shadow of nothingness...]@[textBlack:Our scents will never evaporate there.]
[textBlack:I already know it. The signs are vague]@[textBlack:but unmistakable. A self I don't recognize]@[textBlack:waving her hand to me from a far-off shore.]

[textBlack:I want to push Kei into the shadows with]@[textBlack:my own hands. Shadows with no school, no]@[textBlack:home, no one else, nowhere else. Where none]@[textBlack:can guess or assume about us. I want to go]@[textBlack:into those depths with Kei, drown in the]@[textBlack:dark that smells only of her, fill my lungs.]@[textBlack:I'm irreparably broken.]

[textBlack:Early Morning, August 12]@[textBlack:I flicked through the diary pages,]@[textBlack:glancing along the contents furtively.]@[textBlack:Was the author a friend of this "Kei"?]@[textBlack:]@[textBlack:The entries cut off at August 13.]
[textBlack:I replaced the diary where I'd found it]@[textBlack:and hurried back to the inn.]@[textBlack:I felt as though I'd read something private]@[textBlack:and the guilt was crushing me.]
